name: Creamy Cajun Chicken Pasta
description: Feeling saucy and a little spicy? Then this pasta is for you! It’s a perfectly balanced plate made with pantry staples and just a few fresh ingredients, perfect for weeknights. The seasoning has mild to medium heat for a bit of a kick, while the tomatoey and creamy flavours will keep the whole family happy. Sprinkle on some Better Than Bacon Topper or 3 Onion Dip Mix to complete the dish!

ingredients.name: Louisiana Seasoning or Cajun Fries Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain.
Meanwhile, in Wok, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until browned, about 6 min.
Meanwhile, slice peppers. Remove cooked chicken from wok and add sliced peppers. Cook peppers until soft, about 5–6 min.
Stir in cooked pasta, chicken, seasoning, diced tomatoes, milk, and butter.
Top with additional toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
